com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.storage

Class AdobeLibraryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.storage.AdobeLibraryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class AdobeLibraryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    AdobeLibraryManager is a shared instance that manages libraries and the syncing operations. It can be used to set filtering options for what gets synced in libraries, for controlling sync operations, as well as for getting, creating, and deleting libraries.

    • Method Detail

      • getElementTypesFilter

        public java.util.ArrayList getElementTypesFilter()
        Gets the global filter for filtering what element types to sync and retrieve in all related methods. The library will only return elements with these types when accessing it. Also, when this is specified, only elements of these types will be downloaded when the download policy is set to AdobeLibraryDownloadPolicyTypeManifestAndRenditions or AdobeLibraryDownloadPolicyTypeManifestRenditionsAndAssets.
        Returns:
        returns the global filter for filtering what element types to sync and retrieve in all related methods.

      • getSharedInstance

        public static AdobeLibraryManager getSharedInstance()
        Gets the Adobe Library Manager singleton.
        Returns:
        The AdobeLibraryManager singleton object.

      • removeLocalLibraryFilesInRootFolder

        public static void removeLocalLibraryFilesInRootFolder(java.lang.String rootFolderPath)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        A utility method to delete the local library files in the given root libraries folder. You can use this method when the user logs out and logs in as a different user and you wish to clean up the local design library folder.
        Parameters:
        rootFolderPath - the local root folder for where the libraries and renditions are stored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if some error occurs.

      • getLibraries

        public java.util.ArrayList<AdobeLibraryComposite> getLibraries()
        Gets all library composites.
        Returns:
        an array of AdobeLibraryComposite objects.

      • getDefaultLibrary

        public AdobeLibraryComposite getDefaultLibrary()
        Returns the default library composite. The default library is considered to be the oldest library based on the creation date of each library. A library that has been shared with the user cannot be the default library. If this method returns nil, clients may create a new default library. The new library should be named "My Library" for consistency with other applications.
        Returns:
        the default library composite or nil if no library can be found.

      • createLibraryWithName

        public AdobeLibraryComposite createLibraryWithName(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new library composite with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to use for the new library composite.
        Returns:
        the newly created library composite or nil if an error occurs during creation.

      • leaveSharedLibraryWithId

        public boolean leaveSharedLibraryWithId(java.lang.String libraryId)
                                 throws AdobeLibraryException
        Leaves the shared library composite with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - the ID of the library composite to leave.
        Returns:
        true if the library is left successfully, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        AdobeLibraryException - if error occurs.

        Returns:

        Throws:

        Starts up the Adobe Library service.
        Parameters:
        rootFolder - the root folder to use for storing libraries and their content.
        Returns:
        true if the Adobe Library service is started properly.
        Throws:
        AdobeLibraryException - if error occurs.

      • shutdownWithError

                          throws AdobeLibraryException
        Shuts down the design library manager.
        Returns:
        returns true on success.
        Throws:
        AdobeLibraryException - if error occurs.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the design library manager.

      • registerDelegate

        public void registerDelegate(AdobeLibraryDelegate delegate,
                             AdobeLibraryStartupOptions options)
        Registers a delegate with the given startup options.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the delegate instance to register.
        options - startup options to use by the manager. The manager merges the options if there are more than one delegate registered.

      • deregisterDelegate

        public void deregisterDelegate(AdobeLibraryDelegate delegate)
        De-registers a delegate. The manager automatically shutdowns if there is no more delegate registered after de-registering a delegate.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the delegate instance to deregister.

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Returns whether or not the manager has been started.
        Returns:
        true if the manager has been successfully started up, otherwise false.

      • getSyncStatus

        public AdobeLibrarySyncStatus getSyncStatus()
        Gets the current sync status.
        Returns:
        the current sync status.

      • isSyncEnabled

        public boolean isSyncEnabled()
        Returns whether the sync is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        true if sync is enabled

      • setSyncEnabled

        public void setSyncEnabled(boolean syncEnabled)
        Specifies whether the sync should be enabled or not. Setting this to false will cause the manager not to sync at all (auto or manual). The default value is true, and clients are responsible to setting this back to true, if they set it to false.
        Parameters:
        syncEnabled - true if sync is to be enabled.

      • setSyncAllowedByNetworkStatusMask

        public void setSyncAllowedByNetworkStatusMask(java.util.EnumSet<com.adobe.creativesdk.foundation.adobeinternal.net.AdobeNetworkReachability.AdobeNetworkStatusCode> mask)

      • isSyncAllowedByNetworkStatus

        public boolean isSyncAllowedByNetworkStatus()
        Indicates whether the manager is allowed to do a sync based on the known network status.
        Returns:
        true if manager is allowed to do a sync.

      • isSyncSuspendedDueToAuthenticationError

        public boolean isSyncSuspendedDueToAuthenticationError()
        Returns whether or not the sync is suspended due to an authentication failure. If the manager receives a AdobeNetworkErrorAuthenticationFailed error from any of its network requests, it suspends itself until AdobeLibraryManager#unsuspendSyncDueToNewAuthenticationStatus method is called by the client.
        Returns:
        true if the sync has been suspended due to an authentication error, false otherwise.

      • unsuspendSyncDueToNewAuthenticationStatus

        public void unsuspendSyncDueToNewAuthenticationStatus()
        Unsuspends the sync status of the manager so that the manager can sync again. This method should be called when the manager is suspended and the client is sure that the corresponding storageSession has now a valid authentication token to use with network requests.

      • sync

        public boolean sync()
        Kicks off a sync operation with the cloud. This should be called by the client at appropriate UI events such as a refresh button, activate, etc.
        Returns:
        true if a sync was successfully kicked off, otherwise false. If a sync is already in progress this returns true. If there is an error and sync cannot be started it returns false and an error will be sent in the onSyncError delegate call.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable observable,
                   java.lang.Object data)
        This method is called if the specified Observable object's notifyObservers method is called (because the Observable object has been updated.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        observable - the Observable object.
        data - the data passed to Observable.notifyObservers(Object).
